# Pull Request

## Summary

Short description of what this PR does and why.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Chore / refactor

## Related issues

Closes: # (issue number)

## How to test

Describe steps to verify the change. Include browsers, devices, and assistive tech steps if relevant.

## Accessibility checklist (required for UI changes)

- [ ] Keyboard navigation works (Tab order, focus visible)
- [ ] Screen reader check performed (VoiceOver / NVDA) â€” note results
- [ ] Large touch targets & spacing validated
- [ ] Color contrast checked (WCAG AA)
- [ ] No new hard-coded user-facing strings (i18n ready)

## Screenshots / Recordings

If applicable, add screenshots or short recordings showing the change.

Anything else reviewers should know (migration notes, backwards-compatibility).
